咁對住和平示威者 當然唔洗郁手。。。
香港嗰啲喺度扮晒野 扮街坊扮路過又掟野 難搞啲喎
記者咪又係對住警察
有幾多片段無出街呀大佬

No one is perfect! Always have bad potatoes.

However, from what I saw so far on screens in the last few days. they are so far relatively much better in self-control as compared to those in Hong Kong!! They arrest with force but NOT to break your ribs, and bones, and make you bleed. and get you hurt as part of process!! Much more brutal in HK !!

Their legal system performs much better as a balance and check!

In the last few days ,they will not block you from expressing your opinion, yelling, screaming so that people have a chance to voice out their frustration, anger, etc.....as long as you don't break the law!!
